arts.sum: Spurs bidding to continue fine start to the new season under Thomas Frank

arts.ttl: Surprise guest at Bournemouth game + probable Spurs XI [graphic]
arts.sum: The arranged protest by the Change For Tottenham gang (a subscription-free version of the Tottenham Hotspur Supporters’ Trust) is in for a blow this afternoon, as the bookmakers have Spurs as narrow favourites, and new signing Xavi Simons is tipped to be presented during the pre-match shenanigans. arts.ttl: Tottenham: Dominic Solanke offered assurances but Thomas Frank to stick with Richarlison for Bournemouth clash
arts.sum: The Brazilian has seized his opportunity and looks set to keep Solanke on the bench for a fourth successive game

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Bournemouth – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur welcome AFC Bournemouth to North London on Saturday, with Thomas Frank’s side aiming to continue their perfect start to the season. After an opening-day win over Burnley and a statement victory at Manchester City, Spurs are one of only three teams with maximum points. They face a Bournemouth side who responded to a […] The post Tottenham Hotspur vs Bournemouth – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth XI vs Tottenham Hotspur – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bournemouth travel to face an in-form Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday, looking to bounce back from a disappointing midweek cup exit. Andoni Iraola’s side were beaten 2-0 by Brentford in the Carabao Cup, despite controlling large parts of the game, a result that highlighted a lack of clinical finishing. They will need to be far more […] The post Bournemouth XI vs Tottenham Hotspur – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Bournemouth – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur will look to continue their remarkable early-season transformation under Thomas Frank when they host Bournemouth on Saturday. The Danish manager has instilled a newfound defensive resilience, leading to back-to-back victories and clean sheets to start the campaign. arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola insisted he is preparing for ‘different approaches’ from Tottenham
arts.sum: Thomas Frank is working wonders with Tottenham and will be a tactical test with his "different approaches." “They've kept I think all the all the players they had past season and they added Mohamed Kudus a difference maker.

arts.ttl: Alexander-Arnold and Grealish left out of England squad
arts.sum: Elliot Anderson earns a first senior England nod after dazzling for Forest and Under-21s. Rashford and Wharton return; Foden also left out by Tuchel.
